AI Description: Pandora is a bioinformatics software tool designed for the sequence-based inference of gene function from large-scale biological data sets. It uses a statistical model to identify gene functions by integrating various types of data, such as gene expression profiles, protein-protein interactions, and evolutionary conservation.
Core Features: 1. Inference of gene function from diverse biological data sources. 2. Statistical model for integrating multiple data types. 3. Supports large-scale data sets. 4. User-friendly interface for analysis.
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Sequence Analysis, Gene Function Prediction
